title: Share of boys of primary school age achieving minimum proficiency in mathematics, by population type
subtitle: The share of children who achieve minimum [math](#dod:math-proficiency) proficiency by the end of [primary](#dod:primary-education) education, where students can demonstrate skills in number sense and computation, basic measurement, reading, interpreting, and constructing graphs, spatial orientation, and number patterns. Compares all children in the age group versus only those enrolled in school.
